title: Tower hitboxes pls.
body:
I haven't filmed any but a prime example is Gosu's video ---->  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D5Fxfwyhl04

Having the cursor way above the tower and it's still the hitbox of the tower for some reason. It happened to me earlier today. I didn't die for it but it really is annoying.

replies.body: this is so true, was practising yasuo the other day and i dived, got the kill and because the hit box of the tower was so big yasuo started to attack it and i was like um yasuo i said move not attack the tower, so i had to burn flash.. quite annoying actually
